Rulings.Edison:
●The ●This effect activates in Substep 7 - End of the Damage Step.
●Agido can Special Summon itself.
●This effect does not target.
Rulings.Tengu:
(1) When this card is destroyed and sent to the GY as a result of battle, roll a six-sided die. You can Special Summon 1 Fairy-Type monster from your GY whose Level is equal to the number rolled. (If the result is 6, you can Special Summon a Level 6 or higher monster.)
●The (1) mandatory Trigger Effect activates & resolves in the GY.
●This effect activates in Substep 7 - End of the Damage Step.
●Agido can Special Summon itself.
●This effect does not target.
Rulings.Goat:
●Agido can Special Summon itself.
●Agido's effect does not target.
●While Necrovalley is applying, the effect of Agido will activate, but will be negated.
